name: Holdem or Foldem - Poker Texas Holdem
name_original: Holdem or Foldem - Poker Texas Holdem
description:
Hold'em or Fold'em, that is the question: a game of intelligence, courage, and luck! We hope to offer a REALISTIC Poker experience to you. Here you can play with millions of players from dozens of countries to hit and win a MEGA POT! Hurry up, let's start playing!

Features
♠ Handheld Device: Designed to offer a convenient and interesting experience in a handheld device.
♠ Free Mega Bonus: Multiple bonuses to claim, such as registration rewards, beginner rewards, etc. Don't forget to collect your free chips up to 10M every day!
♠ RNG Certified: An algorithm certified by iTech Labs to keep the game fair and clean!
♠ Multi-Game Modes: Texas Holdem, Sit & Go, Shoot-out, and Tournaments. Choose the one you like most!
♠ Play Live with Friends: Connect your Facebook account to play with your friends and make it a poker night anytime, anywhere.
♠ Mini Slot: Spin and win up to 10M chips in our casino slot machine while waiting for the new round.
♠ Exclusive Fun Events: Ranking, lottery, spin, and many special events here. Come and unlock generous rewards!

Enjoy Texas Hold'em Poker to the fullest!
Follow Hold'em or Fold'em on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/JoinHoldemOrFoldem/

If you have any problems, feel free to contact us in the game by clicking on the Menu > Settings > Help or email us.
Email: Casino@forevernine.com
